---
title: ""
include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fuse.js@7.0.0"></script>
      <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-icons@1.11.0/font/bootstrap-icons.css">
---

<div class="google-style-home">

<div class="logo-container">
<img src="images/warehouse-logo-horizontal.png" alt="The Warehouse" class="warehouse-logo-img-horizontal">
<p class="tagline">Find R packages by what they do</p>
<p class="hero-subtitle">Search 23,000+ packages from CRAN, Bioconductor, and GitHub.<br>Describe your task — we'll find the right tools.</p>
</div>

<div class="search-container-google">
<input type="text" id="package-search" class="search-input-google"
       placeholder="What do you want to do?"
       autofocus>
<span id="search-status" class="search-status"></span>
<div class="search-buttons">
<button class="search-button-google primary" onclick="handleSearch()">Search Packages</button>
<button class="browse-button-google" onclick="window.location.href='categories/'" title="Press 'C' to browse categories"><i class="bi bi-grid-3x3-gap"></i> Browse Categories</button>
</div>
</div>

<div id="search-results" class="search-results-google"></div>

<div id="discover-section" class="discover-section">
<h2 class="discover-title">Discover</h2>
<div class="discover-tabs">
<button class="discover-tab active" data-tab="trending" onclick="switchDiscoverTab('trending')">
<i class="bi bi-fire"></i> Trending
</button>
<button class="discover-tab" data-tab="new" onclick="switchDiscoverTab('new')">
<i class="bi bi-clock"></i> Recent
</button>
<button class="discover-tab" data-tab="rising" onclick="switchDiscoverTab('rising')">
<i class="bi bi-star"></i> Rising Stars
</button>
<button class="discover-tab" data-tab="rweekly" onclick="switchDiscoverTab('rweekly')">
<i class="bi bi-newspaper"></i> R Weekly
</button>
</div>
<div id="discover-packages"></div>
</div>

<div class="quick-links">
<span class="resources-label">Resources:</span>
<a href="https://r-universe.dev" target="_blank">R-Universe</a> •
<a href="https://rweekly.org" target="_blank">R Weekly</a> •
<a href="https://cran.r-project.org" target="_blank">CRAN</a>
</div>

</div>

<script src="js/search.js"></script>
<script src="js/feedback.js"></script>
<script src="js/chatbot.js"></script>
<script src="js/discover.js"></script>
